audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization of existing R&D testing processes. Reducing testing time from days to hours represents significant efficiency gains in product development workflow. Pattern is replicable across other companies with similar testing requirements.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Natura), specific and measurable improvement (days to hours), from what appears to be an official case study source. Claim is concrete and verifiable.
audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case - clear process optimization with quantified time savings in product development testing

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of product development cycle, reducing time-to-market from 12 months to 8 months. This represents efficiency gains in existing product development processes rather than business model change. Replicable pattern for other product companies.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific, quantified metrics (1 year to 8 months). Clear measurement of process improvement with concrete timeframes.

apqc_functions.name: Govern and manage product/service development program

audited_claims.notes: Solid capability enhancement case showing measurable acceleration of existing product development processes

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear cost optimization of existing testing infrastructure. 90% cost reduction represents significant efficiency gains in R&D operations. Pattern applicable to other companies moving testing to cloud environments.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific quantified savings (90% cost reduction, spending only 10% of projected investments). Concrete financial metric from credible source.
audited_claims.notes: Strong cost optimization case with clear quantified benefits in testing operations

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Represents optimization of testing capacity - lower cost per test enabling higher volume. This is functional improvement in R&D operations and replicable pattern.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: While from named organization, the claim lacks specific quantification. 'Much larger volume than expected' is vague and doesn't provide measurable metrics for verification.
audited_claims.notes: Strategic fit is clear but evidence quality is weak due to lack of specific metrics. Needs more quantified data to be fully credible.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of IT infrastructure migration - improving existing IT operations through cloud migration. Represents efficiency gains in IT management processes. Pattern replicable for other large-scale migrations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with highly specific metrics (900 TB data, 20,000+ accounts, six months timeframe). Concrete, measurable achievement from credible source.
audited_claims.notes: Clear IT infrastructure optimization with excellent quantified metrics showing successful large-scale migration

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of employee collaboration and productivity through new tools. Represents improvement in existing workforce management and collaboration processes. Pattern applicable to other organizations implementing collaboration suites.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific metric (80%+ satisfaction rate). Includes methodology context (change management programs). Measurable outcome from credible source.

apqc_functions.name: Manage employee onboarding, training, and development

audited_claims.notes: Good capability case showing measurable improvement in employee satisfaction with new collaboration tools

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of finance operations through automation. Eliminating 17+ hours of manual work per week represents significant efficiency gains in existing financial processes. Replicable pattern for finance automation.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific quantified time savings (17+ hours per week). Concrete metric with clear business context (finance team focusing on higher-value work).

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Strong automation case with clear quantified time savings and workforce augmentation benefits

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of information retrieval processes. 83% reduction in search time (30 minutes to 5 minutes) represents significant efficiency gains in knowledge management. Pattern replicable across organizations with similar information access challenges.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific, quantified improvement (83% reduction, 30 minutes to 5 minutes). Clear before/after metrics from credible source.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage enterprise-wide knowledge management (KM) capability
Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Excellent knowledge management optimization case with clear quantified time savings in information retrieval

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing business functions (R&D testing, product development, IT infrastructure, finance operations, knowledge management) rather than business model transformation or new revenue streams.
